pages.text: O-Rabbits drop rabbit hide and meat. They can also be bred to have different patterns and tamed with veggies. While they wonâ€™t follow you, you can make them stay by right-clicking them. $(br2)O-Rabbits can come in 4 different breeds: $(br2)Default, Lop, Dwarf and Giant. Only Default spawn in the wild, and other breeds must be bred in.

pages.name: The O-Rabbit
pages.text: A lop bunny with no markings.
